tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First time I met him. Though it was late night,Dr was relaxed and cool. There was no sign of exhaustion. He checked all the reports I carried and scrutinized them. Advised some tests and changes in BP tablets which is being taken since long.
Now I feel better
Looking forward to show reports  of tests done.
My best wishes to him.
